remarks: Equinumerosity inference from an implicit one-to-one onto function. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2004.)
statement:
en3i.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
en3i.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
en3i.3 $e |- ( x e. A -> C e. B ) $.
en3i.4 $e |- ( y e. B -> D e. A ) $.
en3i.5 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ( x = D <-> y = C ) ) $.
en3i $p |- A ~~ B $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C y $.
$d D x $.
